successes.title: 25 Years of Tomorrow
successes.description: It's This Modern World's 25th anniversary -- and I want to celebrate by publishing a two-volume compilation of ALL THE CARTOONS!

Pledges.description: Pledge $1 or more to help me make this dream a reality! You'll have my sincere gratitude!

THE PDF: A DRM-free digital copy of the 1,000 page collection 25 YEARS OF TOMORROW. Also includes a six-month subscription to the TMW email subscription list, SPARKY'S LIST* (or for current subscribers:  a gift subscription for a friend or relative!).
*SPARKY'S LIST is a subscription-only weekly email list which gives readers an advance look at each new cartoon, along with additional commentary and links.

THE BOOK: The two-volume hardcover book, 25 YEARS OF TOMORROW! 1,000 pages in an attractive slipcase! Weighs approximately 15 pounds! Contains 1,500 cartoons, give or take, plus numerous rarities! Also includes the PDF and six-month email subscription.

SIGNED AND STAMPED EDITION: You'll get the hardcover book, with a bookplate signed and stamped by Tom Tomorrow, using a special ink-stamp which will be designed exclusively for TMW 25, and destroyed afterward! Also includes the PDF and six-month email subscription.

SILLY MAYOR EDITION: You'll get the hardcover book, with a bookplate signed and stamped by Tom Tomorrow, AND a copy of the children's book, THE VERY SILLY MAYOR. It's the only major work by Tom not included in the two-volume retrospective. Also includes the PDF and six-month email subscription.

T-SHIRT EDITION: You'll get the hardcover book, with a bookplate signed and stamped by Tom Tomorrow, AND your choice of either a Sparky or Droney t-shirt.  Also includes the PDF and six-month email subscription.

Images at thismodernworld.com/kickstarter 
(you'll have to copy and paste link, hotlinks aren't enabled in reward descriptions)

STUFFED SPARKY EDITION: You'll get the hardcover book, with a bookplate signed and stamped by Tom Tomorrow, AND a plush Sparky the Penguin to snuggle while you read! Also includes the PDF and six-month email subscription.

Image at 
thismodernworld.com/kickstarter
(copy and paste link)

SIGNED PRINT EDITION: You'll get the hardcover book, with a bookplate signed and stamped by Tom Tomorrow, AND a special limited edition, signed and numbered 8.5 x 11" print of the Oct. 8, 2014 TMW cartoon, "Hashtags are Weapons of War!" Also includes the PDF and six-month email subscription.

Image at thismodernworld.com/kickstarter 
(copy and paste link)

POSTER ROULETTE EDITION: You'll get the hardcover book, with a bookplate signed and stamped by Tom Tomorrow, AND a randomly selected rare poster from Tom's archives! Also includes the PDF and six-month email subscription. Posters may have slight edge wear.

Images at 
thismodernworld.com/kickstarter 
(copy and paste link)

VEDDER SHOW POSTER EDITION: You'll get the hardcover book, with a bookplate signed and stamped by Tom Tomorrow! PLUS an 18x24 silk screened poster by Tom Tomorrow for Eddie Vedder's Nov. 30, 2012 Ft. Lauderdale show with Glen Hansard, signed and numbered by Tom Tomorrow. Also includes the PDF and six-month email subscription.

Image at  
thismodernworld.com/kickstarter 
 (copy and paste link)

DOGGIE DINER EDITION: You'll get the hardcover book, with a bookplate signed and stamped by Tom Tomorrow! PLUS an approximately 17x22 print of Tom's rare ATTACK OF THE DOGGIE DINER HEADS print, signed but not numbered. Posters are printed in archival ink on fine art paper. Also includes the PDF and six-month email subscription.

Image at 
 thismodernworld.com/kickstarter  
(copy and paste link)

MATEWAN EDITION:  You'll get the hardcover book, with a bookplate signed and stamped by Tom Tomorrow, AND an original movie poster from the film MATEWAN personally autographed to you by director John Sayles and producer Maggie Renzi. Also includes the PDF and six-month email subscription.

BACKSPACER PRINTER'S PROOF POSTER EDITION: You'll get the hardcover book, with a bookplate signed and stamped by Tom Tomorrow!  PLUS a poster-sized printer's proof of the printed Backspacer album cover artwork, with two images of the album cover and various color registration marks, on 28x40 paper stock. NOTE: THERE IS NO ALBUM INCLUDED. These are the proofs the printer sent to me and to the band for final approval right before the print run. Ultra rare -- unless you are friends with the band, there is nowhere else to get these. PLEASE see the photos at the link below for details (there is no center "brain" image because of the die-cut.) Proofs may have slight wrinkling. Signed to you personally by Tom Tomorrow. Also includes the PDF and six-month email subscription.

Image at  
thismodernworld.com/kickstarter 
 (copy and paste link)

BACKSPACER EDITION: You'll get the hardcover book, with a bookplate signed and SKETCHED by Tom Tomorrow, AND a vinyl copy of Pearl Jam's album, Backspacer, with the album cover SIGNED BY ALL FIVE MEMBERS OF THE BAND! Also includes the PDF and six-month email subscription.
Note: we make no guarantees as to the condition of the vinyl — no returns in case of imperfections.

Image at 
thismodernworld.com/kickstarter 
(copy and paste link)

ORIGINAL STRIP EDITION: You'll get the hardcover book, with a bookplate signed and SKETCHED by Tom Tomorrow! PLUS an original This Modern World strip from the 1990s, composed of xerography, pen and ink, and zip-a-tone! Tom has worked digitally since 2000, so there's a finite supply of these. Backers choose from 10 available strips, in order of pledging. Also includes the PDF and six-month email subscription.

Image at 
thismodernworld.com/kickstarter 
(copy and paste link)

ZIPPY THE PINHEAD EDITION: You'll get the hardcover book, with a bookplate signed and SKETCHED by Tom Tomorrow! PLUS an original Zippy strip donated by legendary comics artist Bill Griffith, and a signed copy of Bill's book THE DINGBURG DIARIES! Also includes the PDF and six-month email subscription.

Image at 
thismodernworld.com/kickstarter 
(copy and paste link)
